title: Entry-Level Web Developer
technologies: Excellent HTML5, CSS3 proficiency', 'Comfortable implementing responsive designs', 'Experience with SASS, SCSS, or LESS.', 'Comfortable working with Git or other version control systems', 'Some design experience preferred but not required'.'
description: South Central Digital is seeking an experienced and talented Web Developer. This individual will work on varying projects with internal web designers, developers and project managers, as well as be assigned projects to complete on an individual level. This individual will work with our internal web developers and project managers, as well as be assigned projects to complete on an individual level. Ideal candidates will have a can-do attitude, passion for technology, proof of development experience, and will be able to get up to speed quickly.
budget: This is a full-time, salaried position in our Nashville, TN office.

title: Software Programmer Spring Internship
technologies: Assist with the design and development of new features for existing business software.', 'Work with current software engineers do developers a better understanding of technologies being used by the team.', 'Research, understand, and provide knowledge of new and emerging technologies to implement innovative solutions.', 'Help with tasks related to support of existing applications.'
description:
This job might be for you if:
Must be Located in the Nashville, TN area
Currently Pursuing a degree in Computer Science or technical role
Must be available in January 2020
A solid understanding of client-side development with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Experience utilizing modern client-side JavaScript frameworks like Angular JS, React
Experience with Unity development for Augmented Reality & Mixed Reality applications is a huge plus
Experience with Bootstrap, Sass, and Gulp a plus
Ability to develop full-scale applications with C# .NET and Razor, or comparable platforms
Experience with object-oriented principles and development patterns like MVC
Well versed in HTML/CSS with experience using CSS extensions like SASS and template languages like HAML
Experience or interest in learning mobile web development a plus
Source Control systems like TFS, and/or GIT knowledge preferred
Experience with REST and SOAP clients for Web Services interaction
Working knowledge to interact with Databases like Microsoft SQL Server and Mongo DB for Full Stack Development
Working experience with Microsoft Azure, AWS, containers and/or VM technologies
Demonstrated ability to work and learn as part of a team
We seek out and reward people for being straightforward, open, passionate, effective and challenging the status quo. We want our employees to reflect the diversity of the communities in which we operate. We welcome people as they are, creating an inclusive culture where all forms of diversity are seen as a real value for the company. We’re looking for people with a passion for success — on the job and beyond.
contactEmail: You must submit an online application to be considered for any position with us.

title: Software Development Internship - Technology & Operations Program
technologies: Developing an analytics and pricing engine for mortgage-backed securities, 'Implementing new quantitative models and enhancement of the portfolio management process, 'Developing a system to identify trading opportunities based on new strategies', 'Building a bond recommendation engine', 'Automating trade processes to reduce risk and maximize efficiency.'
description: Software development teams support a vast range of investment and financial platforms, including equities, fixed income, sales, trading, multi-asset solutions, private client, research, corporate finance, data management, and more. As a summer Intern, you will be part of a software development team, implementing functional and technical specifications provided by business analysts and development managers. You will learn both the functional and technical aspects of an application in addition to the languages and frameworks used for construction. Software development internships involve hands-on learning, supported by team members, project managers, and formal technology training. Developers use just about every programming language at AllianceBernstein, so Interns will learn and apply a broad range of technical skills throughout the summer.
contactEmail: Please feel free to contact us at topprogram@alliancebernstein.com.

title: Java Developer
technologies: Develop solutions following established technical design, application development standards and quality processes in projects, 'Assess the impacts on technical design because of the changes in functional requirements.', 'Perform independent code reviews and execute unit tests on modules developed by self and other junior team members on the project.', 'Write well-designed, efficient, and testable code', 'Interact with other stakeholders not limited to end-user clients, Project Manager/Scrum master, Business Analysts, offshore development, testing and other cross-functional teams.'
description:
CORE BUSINESS OPERATIONS
Core Business Operations (CBO) is an integrated set of offerings that addresses our clients' core business issues. CBO provides a gamut of consulting services spanning advisory, implementation and operations. CBO practitioners help our clients transform, modernize, and run their existing technology platforms right from process design to implementation and finally ensuring roll-out transition.
CBO has four different offerings — Systems Engineering focused on design, delivery and support of large scale software applications and integrated systems; Cloud Engineering focused on end-to-end cloud services from migration strategy into transformation and cloud operations; Core Industry Solutions focused on industry vertical, sector specific solutions that drive operational change and automate the core of the business; and Operations Transformation focused on creating a flexible, innovative business model for clients supported by a strong operations foundation. CBO serves clients across Life Sciences and Health Care, Government & Public Services and Financial Services among other industries.
budget: This is a full-time, salaried position.

title: Front End Developer
technologies: As a front end developer at Generous, you will be bringing design visions to life in a fast-paced environment that values creativity and innovation.', 'You will be an important voice in the organization and will have the opportunity to make a difference in your work life while helping to spread generosity to our future user base.', 'An ideal candidate will have most of the following: * B.S. Degree or higher in Computer Science or other STEM discipline is preferred, but is not a deal-breaker.'
description:
* Lots of JavaScript experience, including ES6
* Significant React experience
* Experience integrating with backend APIs: REST, GraphQL (bonus points for GraphQL experience), etc.
* Comfort level with 1 or more version control systems. We use Git.
* HTML
* CSS
* Testing framework experience: Jest, Mocha, Chai, etc.
* Firebase development experience
* Pair programming skills are a plus
* FinTech experience is a bonus
* Experience with AWS technology stack

title: React Developer
technologies: BA/BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent industry experience', '2+ years experience developing in React and various technologies such as: Redux, Next.js, Styled-Components', 'Relational database experience with PostgreSQL, Informix, or other equivalent RDBMS', 'Basic understanding of front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, etc)', 'Basic understanding of front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, etc).'
description:
Located in the heart of Crossville, TN, The Cosby Harrison Company connects buyers and sellers in the aviation, heavy construction, oil and gas, and trucking industries with our buy/sell publications, websites, signage, and complete marketing solutions. We help buyers in these industries find the products and services they need from a huge selection of quality sellers and we provide sellers with an audience that is in the market and ready to buy. We help businesses in these niche markets dominate by putting their products in front of a large audience of the right people in print, online, at industry trade shows, on social media, and search engines.

Our mission is to strive to continually offer superior printed and web-based products and services while always providing excellent customer service and paying close attention to our customers' needs and the changing technological environment.

title: Java Developer
technologies: Participate in planning meetings, help team create well-written stories and consider customer risks when prioritizing', 'Build code that is well-written according to team development guidelines and software best practices', 'Take high-level descriptions of the desired technical solution and provide functional end results with little supervisory direction.', 'Communicate and collaborate with team members across geographical, technical, and functional boundaries', 'Work closely with QA staff'.
description:
Auction Edge is the automotive remarketing industry’s leading provider of technology and services to independent auctions, dealers, and corporate remarketers. With 230 independent auction customers and millions of cars processed per year, Auction Edge is uniquely positioned to serve the competitive needs of the independent auction community. To learn more, visit www.auctionedge.com.

We are currently seeking a Java Developer to join our team in Pensacola, FL or Nashville, TN. Responsibilities include system development, analysis, and support for the auto auction application systems that stretch across all layers and operating environments.
contactEmail: For immediate consideration, please apply online at: https://careers-hrpmsi.icims.com/jobs/3275/java-developer/login
